content: *this scoodie functions as both a scarf and a hood lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60512 skill level beginner level 1 a 920-184 babysoft melon 1 ball b 910-146 microspun yarn fuchsia 2 balls c 910-186 microspun yarn mango 2 balls *colors in original pattern have been discontinued * crochet hook - size s-35 speed hook 19 mm worked with 1 strand of a b and c held together throughout fold piece in half and sew seam along back of hood to finish *ed note originally intended for children pattern can be adapted for teens and adults by making it larger *
